roleset.name: support, hold upright
roleset.note: PROP_UP-V NOTES: I'm pretty sure this can only occur as 'prop up', although I have vagueintuitions of 'prop open'. That will be treated exactly the same way,though. (from prop.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Carried even further, some investors assumed that since leveraged buy-outs are the only thing propping up stock prices, the market would collapse if no more LBOs could be done.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: [John's self-esteem]-1 is propped *trace*-1 up with industrial-strength pharmaceuticals.
